description: Lesson 5: Passive Transport - Discover how cells move substances without energy using diffusion, facilitated diffusion, and osmosis.
learningIntentions: Explain the process of simple diffusion across membranes
Describe facilitated diffusion using channel/carrier proteins
Predict movement of substances based on concentration gradients
Identify factors affecting rates of passive transport
successCriteria: Define diffusion and state it requires no ATP
Explain why cell size affects transport efficiency
